about_the_game:
Missed out on the Summer event and you don't want to wait for it to roll back around next year? This pass will permanently re-activate the summer update and unlock Blaze for good, allowing you to go back to the ten levels of the summer event and take Blaze into the main campaign! Includes the following:

- Access to the Summer event level pack (it's in the event tab)

- Permanent and immediate access to Blaze Fairum, the hot-headed fairy with powerful fire magic.

Note that purchasing this does NOT complete the summer event's ten levels, it merely re-opens them and unlocks Blaze. For skins and achievements, you'll still have to play through them all.

Warning: This DLC pass exists exclusively to re-enable access to the event for those who have missed out on it and don't want to wait until next year for it to return. The Summer event lasts from June 20th to September 22nd every year, be sure to check the current time and date before purchasing this DLC so that you don't end up spending money on something you don't need. This DLC will not provide any benefits that can't be gained in the base game whenever the event returns every Summer.

name: Dimension Quest Pinball Season Pass - Blazing Summer

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Dimension Quest Pinball Season Pass - Spring + Summer - $2.99

package_groups.title: Buy Dimension Quest Pinball Season Pass - Blazing Summer

short_description: A pass to bring back the Blazing Summer event, giving you access to Blaze and the event level pack not just for a few months, but forever! For purchase by anyone that missed the event.
